name: newsletter-custom-app
title: Newsletter Custom App
description: Custom App that exports some useful blocks for the User Newsletter subscription

sessionApi.title: Session API Endpoint
sessionApi.description: Set the endpoint for the API call used to retrieve user session info, this is useful to know if user is logged in (i.e write something like this: /_v/wrapper/api/user/newsletteroptin).

userInfoApi.title: User Info API Endpoint
userInfoApi.description: Set the endpoint for the API call used to retrieve user info basing on user email (i.e write something like this: /_v/wrapper/api/user/email/userinfo?email=).

postUserApi.title: Post User API Endpoint
postUserApi.description: Set the endpoint for the API call used to subscribe user to newsletter and create an account for it in VTEX (i.e write something like this: /_v/wrapper/api/user?userId=true).

newsletteroptinApi.title: Newsletter Optin API Endpoint
newsletteroptinApi.description: Set the endpoint for the API call used to set isNewsletterOptin to true to user that has already an account in VTEX (i.e write something like this: /_v/wrapper/api/user/newsletteroptin).
